org.hibernate.validator.cfg.context

接口 ConstraintMappingTarget

  • 所有超级接口:
    ConstraintDefinitionTarget, TypeTarget
    所有已知子接口:

    所有已知实现类:
    ContainerElementConstraintMappingContextImpl, TypeConstraintMappingContextImpl

    public interface ConstraintMappingTarget
extends TypeTarget, ConstraintDefinitionTarget
    Facet of a constraint mapping creational context which allows to start a new constraint mapping or definition.
